title: AWS Lambda to AWS IoT Core
description: This pattern contains a sample AWS SAM stack to publish a message to AWS IoT Core Thing

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern contains a sample AWS SAM stack with an AWS IoT Core thing and a Lambda function.
The Lambda function publishes a message to the Iot topic which you can view in the console.
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.
